Text: Scheduled Envision System OutageIMPORTANT MESSAGE PLEASE READ THIS MESSAGE FILENET SYSTEM OUTAGE AUGUST All users will NOT be able to access the System after close of business on Friday the th and we anticipate users having full access on Monday morning August th The FileNET System is scheduled to be down for maintenance to start upgrade process to IMS This upgrade will be done in several stages the first stage being the Oracle database For this upgrade all batches scanned or imported into queues must be cleared from the FileNET System by Friday August th at noon If you have any questions or concerns about this outage please feel free to call the Help Desk Option Envision and EnCompass Support Help Desk Option
